directions.text: Cream together butter, sugar, and peanut butter with a mixer.
Beat the eggs with vanilla and add to mixer.
Slowly add flour, baking soda, salt and peanut butter chips.
Roll into walnut sized balls and place on greased cookie sheets.
Using a fork press each ball in two directions, dipping fork in water to prevent sticking.
Cook for 13.5 mins, cool on wire rack.
